dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: All evidence points to the conclusion that this case was... Agh, bloody hell, I almost had it! Wait a moment.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: Don't disturb me this morning. I'm trying to wrap my head around this case, and I don't want any disruptions.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: Tea...? Well, it's midday, so I wouldn't mind a cuppa, but... Haah, it's a bit awkward to go there at the moment. I'm long overdue for the conclusion of this case, and I don't want the cafeteria lass givin' me the glares over the counter.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: I'm not here because I want to be here. It's just... I can't get a wink of sleep before this case is wrapped up. Otherwise, it'll nag at the back of my mind all night.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: Don't call me a profiler or some other grand title. I'm doing nothing fancy... I just make conjectures based on junk I find here and there.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg:
Haah... Can't say I'm absolutely certain, but look at his records. I reckon this wanker's already got a target on his back.
Uh, did I just—no, no. I didn't just refer to our client as 'this wanker'. Shut up, I didn't.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg:
Tsk. You know what's harder than drawing conclusions about a case? Writing the follow—up report.
If only some bloke could organize my thoughts into a neat report as I narrate them.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg:
I think we're pretty good at this shi—I mean, post—contract management. I can also confirm if my predictions were right...
Besides, I get to smash some heads. I got pretty invested in the case over the course of this investigation, you know.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg: Of course, taking care of these idiots is a much easier job. I don't even need to use my brain. Well... not that I dislike case analyses. That's got its own charms.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: So... that's how it— Haah, would you look at that.

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: Ah. Uh—huh. Hold that thought. I'm starting to connect the dots. ...Ahh, so that's how that happened... Right. We'll chat later. Uh—huh, cheers.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: A post—contract management, is it?

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Let's go solve this case, yeah?

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: Huh? What. It's not him? No way.

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Is it you?!

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Reeling, are you?

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Kah...

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Right, so that one's taken care of.

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: Ah... That's... odd. That deviates... from the patterns.

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Hmph, I knew it.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: It's not? No way. But my hunch...

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: I was right on the money in the end, weren't I? I'm no nitwit, I'll have you know!

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: And that's as far as my intuition will carry me. I'm not wrong again... am I?

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: Bloody hell, I didn't expect things to go cock-up in the post—contract management... This isn't at all how I thought it'd go.
